title: Latest Browser Games 2015that Can Hook You
text:
Latest Browser Games 2015that Can Hook You October 1 2003   
A New year always requires new upgrades, modifications and resolutions. The developers` resolutions this year was letting us gamers enjoy browser games like never before. Therefore an amazing set of games were released in 2015 (until now) some were old but some tweaks here and there were added while others were entirely new. Either ways we ensure you that there are loads of fun waiting for you with browser games 2015. So enough with the talks and let`s see what 2015 is holding for us. 1- DRAKENSANG Online: Developed and published by Bigpoint this 3D online game will give you goosebumps with its amazing graphics and exciting game play.Customizing your character itself, magic powers and skills are all features in the game. In addition challenging quests are available, different characters to choose from and a quite decent variety of armory variation as well as magic powers. Dragonknight freedom fighters and magical Spellweavers fighting against the monsters of the Anderworld,, NOW HOW COOL IS THAT? As other browser games, it has a PvP mode and creation of alliances with other players where they can face the evil powers together and take them down. So get ready to be overwhelmed by the amazing graphics during the game play, with high details of flames, surrounding environment and monsters` details……OH SCARY. 2- Adventure Quest Worlds: After releasing DragonFabe and MechQuest, Artix Entertainment is going classic with its 2D fantasy online game “Adventure Quest Worlds”. Real time battling is used in battling with other players and monsters which provide you with an amusing gameplay experience. The company has said that it may go with the PvP mode since it is a multiplayer game. After each battle the players gain gold and experience points. 3- AIRMECH: A Strategic 3D game with a Sci-Fi touch. That is what Carbon Games is bringing you this year for online games. The game comes with a fast-paced DotA-style game play, transforming MECHS and customizable units. The game is available through Google Chrome browser and Steam. Yea I know sounds like a lot of fun. 4- Alliance warfare: Shifting from Sci-Fi strategy games such as AIRMECH to a little journey back through time strategy one that is brought to you by Digital Experience Studios. Upgradable bases, wide variety of continents to choose from and you can form and destroy alliances. Spend some great time in planning how to allocate your resources between defensive options, offensive ones and research and technology. All these features come in a simple entertaining 2D package. To wrap things up, there was a huge development in the browser games 2015 in all different categories. Whether you are a strategic gamer, fantasy one or just a normal gamer you will always find what suits your taste and nearly all of the releases are amazing. Oh, Did I mention that we are still mid-year with all of these releases? Yea, you can figure out how the rest of 2014 will be. ...
